# Gates Enterprises LLC

## Colorado's Most Certified Roofing Contractor

> Gates Enterprises LLC is a quadruple manufacturer certified roofing and exterior contractor based in Lakewood, Colorado, serving the entire Front Range.

## Services

- Roof Replacement
- Storm Damage & Hail Repair
- Siding Installation
- Gutter Installation
- Window Replacement
- Exterior Painting
- Insurance Restoration

## Certifications

- GAF Master Elite (Top 2% nationally)
- Owens Corning Preferred
- Malarkey Emerald Pro
- CertainTeed Shingle Master Pro

## Key Facts

- 7,204+ roofs completed
- 10+ years in business
- 4.8 star rating, 293+ Google reviews
- Up to 50 year manufacturer warranty
- 7 year workmanship warranty
- 100+ employees
- Locally owned and operated

## Service Area

Colorado Front Range: Denver, Lakewood, Arvada, Westminster, Thornton, Broomfield, Brighton, Northglenn, Federal Heights, Commerce City, Aurora, Wheat Ridge, Littleton, Englewood, Golden, Morrison, Evergreen, Parker, Castle Rock, Highlands Ranch, Centennial, Lone Tree, Superior
